drupal-create-entity.description: Create a new entity in Drupal with smart field discovery and validation

props.name: entity_type
props.description: Choose the type of content to create.

props.name: entity_fields
props.description: Fill in the content fields. Available fields depend on the entity type selected above.

props.name: entity_type
props.description: Choose the type of content to delete.

props.name: entity_uuid
props.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the specific content item to delete.

drupal-get-entity.description: Retrieve a single entity by UUID

props.name: entity_type
props.description: Choose the type of content to retrieve.

props.name: entity_uuid
props.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the specific content item to retrieve.

drupal-list-entities.description: List entities from Drupal using JSON:API

props.name: entity_type
props.description: Choose what type of content to list.

props.name: sort_by
props.description: Choose how to sort the entities

props.name: limit
props.description: Maximum number of entities to retrieve (0 = all entities)

props.name: output_options
props.description: Return only basic fields (UUID, title, status, dates) instead of all entity data

props.name: minimal_output
props.description: Return only basic fields (UUID, title, status, dates) instead of all entity data

drupal-call-service.description: Call a service on the Drupal site

drupal-update-entity.description: Update an existing entity in Drupal with smart field discovery and validation

props.name: entity_type
props.description: Select the entity type and bundle

props.name: entity_uuid
props.description: The UUID of the entity to update

props.name: entity_fields
props.description: Update the values for the entity fields (only provide values for fields you want to change)

drupalPollingId.description: A trigger that polls the Drupal site by ID.

props.name: name
props.description: The name identifies the poll. It must be unique. It will be used to identify the poll in the Drupal site, e.g. if you use ECA to respond to this poll, you need to use the same name in the configuration of its poll event.

drupalPollingTimestamp.description: A trigger that polls the Drupal site by timestamp.

props.name: name
props.description: The name identifies the poll. It must be unique. It will be used to identify the poll in the Drupal site, e.g. if you use ECA to respond to this poll, you need to use the same name in the configuration of its poll event.

drupalWebhook.description: A webhook that the Drupal site can call to trigger a flow.

props.name: id
props.description: This name identifies the webhook. It must be unique. It will be used to identify the webhook in the Drupal site, e.g. if you use ECA to call this webhook, you will find this name in the list of available webhooks.
